channel.title: Please help me! :(
channel.description:
ive been following a tut for bounty hunter on PI and i get this error...
[code]src/server/model/player/Client.java:1251: error: cannot find symbol BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this);
symbol: variable BountyHunter location: class client[/code]
i dont know where to add the variable. or how to but when i try i get this error (i added "public int BountyHunter;") to Client.java
[code]src/server/model/player/Client.java:1252: error: int cannot be dereferanced BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this);[/code]
if u wanna take a look the post is at
http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/307476-pi-90-bounty-hunter.html
the code i put in is
[code] if(inBountyHunterCombat()) { BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this); }[/code]

item.title: Please help me! :(
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

ive been following a tut for bounty hunter on PI and i get this error…

[code]src/server/model/player/Client.java:1251: error: cannot find symbol
BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this);

symbol: variable BountyHunter
location: class client[/code]

i dont know where to add the variable. or how to but when i try i get this error (i added “public int BountyHunter;”) to Client.java

src/server/model/player/Client.java:1252: error: int cannot be dereferanced BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this);

if u wanna take a look the post is at

http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/307476-pi-90-bounty-hunter.html

the code i put in is

if(inBountyHunterCombat()) { BountyHunter.refreshBountyHunter(this); }

Read full topic
